page.title: 15TELEVISION PERSONALITY
page.content: Horsley is in a{stockbroker belt} attracting various types.{Bill Moore} {and Mollie Sugden}are local television stars.They have lived in the area for 18 years bringing up 2 sons and sending them to local schools.They were attracted by the greenery and space;but as it is less convenient for work than where they lived before they often use public transport. They think they are well catered for in Horsley although they like doing charity work but find it difficult to help this community.Since they have lived in Horsley they have seen many changes.{The village has become more } {built up and very busy.}Before the village was quieter with less traffic. The traffic has become too urban and they are moving to a more rural area.
